definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: Before they started on the trip, Paul had Timothy circumcised.
sentences.chinese: 在他们开始旅行之前，保罗要提摩太行了割礼。

sentences.english: And Ishmael his son was thirteen years old, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子以实玛利受割礼的时候，年十三岁。

sentences.english: Saying, Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised, and didst eat with them.
sentences.chinese: 你进入未受割礼之人的家，和他们一同吃饭了。

sentences.english: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any value.
sentences.chinese: 原来在基督耶稣里，受割礼不受割礼，全无功效。

sentences.english: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any value.
sentences.chinese: 原来在基督耶稣里，受割礼不受割礼，全无功效。

sentences.english: 3and said, "You went into the house of uncircumcised men and ate with them."
sentences.chinese: 你进入未受割礼之人的家，和他们一同吃饭了。

sentences.english: The cutter leaves a tiny opening to permit urination and menstruation.
sentences.chinese: 割礼师会留下一个小开口用来排尿和经血。

sentences.english: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law?
sentences.chinese: 人若在安息日受割礼，免得违背摩西的律法。

sentences.english: Sweden has a law setting medical rules over who may conduct male circumcisions.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典已立法对男性割礼的实施人员制定了医疗准则。

sentences.english: And Abraham was ninety years old and nine, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
sentences.chinese: 亚伯拉罕受割礼的时候，年九十九岁。

sentences.english: Student: Does Matthew believe Gentiles should be circumcised?
sentences.chinese: 马太认为外邦人应该行割礼吗？

sentences.english: Is any called in uncircumcision? let him not be circumcised.
sentences.chinese: 有人未受割礼蒙召呢，就不要受割礼。

sentences.english: Is any called in uncircumcision? let him not be circumcised.
sentences.chinese: 有人未受割礼蒙召呢，就不要受割礼。

sentences.english: and his son Ishmael was thirteen;
sentences.chinese: 他儿子以实玛利受割礼的时候年十三岁。

sentences.english: P.D.M: Does Matthew believe that Gentiles should be circumcised?
sentences.chinese: 马太认为外邦人应该行割礼吗？

sentences.english: But every man's servant that is bought for money， when thou hast circumcised him， then shall he eat thereof.
sentences.chinese: 但各人用银子买的奴仆，既受了割礼就可以吃。

definition: Holy sacrament/Christian rite (esp. Protestant)/also called 聖事|圣事 by Catholics
